actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Foreign Relations.

official_title: A bill to provide for acquisition of lands in connection with the International Tijuana River Flood Control project.

summary.text: Amends the authorization for United States participation in the International Tijuana River flood control project to decrease the amount authorized to be appropriated for construction of such project from $12,600,000 to $10,800,000. Authorizes Federal participation with non-Federal interests for the acquisition of land for such project, contingent upon the contribution of an appropriate share of needed funds by the City of San Diego.

titles.title: A bill to provide for acquisition of lands in connection with the International Tijuana River Flood Control project.
